title: WebSite
description: A WebSite is a set of related web pages and other items typically served from a single web domain and accessible via URLs.

allOf.description: The most generic kind of creative work, including books, movies, photographs, software programs, etc.

issn.description: The International Standard Serial Number (ISSN) that identifies this serial publication. You can repeat this property to identify different formats of, or the linking ISSN (ISSN-L) for, this serial publication.
